name: Sivo
headline: Debt as a service for companies to lend money to their users at scale.
description:
Sivo provides debt as a service. Our API and risk protocol allows fintechs, neobanks, and gig platforms to lend money to their users, at scale, without having to raise debt which can take up to two years. You can think of us as Stripe for Debt. 

We started 6 months ago, in March signed a $100m debt capital partnership, and will be launching our API in April. We already have more than 100 companies in our customer pipeline including Uber. 

We’ve been able to move so quickly because we are a team with previous exits and decades of experience in risk, debt, and enterprise software for companies including Goldman Sachs, Revolut, NASA, McKinsey and Citigroup.

founders.name: Kate Hiscox, Founder
founders.description: Originally from the UK and based in Vancouver. I've been building companies for 15+ years with Sivo being company #6. Exits include an IPO (9 figure valuation post listing on the TSX-V). I like to build things and never take no for an answer!

founders.name: Dani Conejo Rico, Founder
founders.description: I am passionate about building intuitive digital products, bringing about an end to predatory lending and cramming in as many races as I can! I am based in Vancouver and Mexico City where I love to cook, run and spend time with my wife and family.

##### Founder friendly, tech enabled debt capital
# Debt-as-a-Service
**Up to $20M in fast, easy-to-understand debt capital. Our API enables companies to lend to their users at scale.**
Thank you! Your submission has been received!
Oops! Something went wrong while submitting the form.
Trusted by companies backed by
![Y Combinator logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6416463a04ae8a7018b7235e/64174e4c570b0d66d360f467_Ycombinator.svg)
Powering capital and integrations with the companies you love
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6416463a04ae8a7018b7235e/66f34a92128fe5765418c93f_kapital.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6416463a04ae8a7018b7235e/66f348b126c9226873c05d34_stripe.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6416463a04ae8a7018b7235e/66f348b1c2b9544e0c2ae11a_Kintai.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6416463a04ae8a7018b7235e/66f348b057115155115717b4_quickbooks.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6416463a04ae8a7018b7235e/66f34a92bc8650ecf30bfe01_cobre.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6416463a04ae8a7018b7235e/66f352a762b948b556d96244_whiteArtboard%2027.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6416463a04ae8a7018b7235e/66f34a929b4ebe8e1984b442_shuffle.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6416463a04ae8a7018b7235e/66f34b34f1f6261ece7c43fb_Logo-Blanco-CargaYa.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6416463a04ae8a7018b7235e/66f348b19c63446bb860f16b_credilikeme.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6416463a04ae8a7018b7235e/66f348b063288c0655780a28_deltax.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6416463a04ae8a7018b7235e/66f348b01145c9125bf694fb_ava.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6416463a04ae8a7018b7235e/66f34a927c77d74caa3aae94_quipu.png)
"We received interest from other funds during our debt capital raise, but Sivo was the simplest to get up and running, and we were able to integrate our system with their API for reporting."
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6416463a04ae8a7018b7235e/66f5566ce570f1542e559615_Ollie%20Purdue%20LinkedIn.jpeg)
Ollie Purdue, CEO
Shuffle Finance, UK
“Sivo has been a strong debt capital partner for us. The program is easy to understand, and we've been able to tap into leverage based on performance.”
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6416463a04ae8a7018b7235e/66fdc234c1c5af25bb704a93_Screenshot%202024-10-02%20at%202.58.59%20PM.png)
Emilio Uribe, CEO
Cobre, Latam
![Girl thinking](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6416463a04ae8a7018b7235e/6418d09f0e276049ea29c3a8_Sivo-girl.png)
##### The problem
### Raising debt capital 
**is complex.**
  * ##### 1
**Traditional funds avoid early-stage fintechs needing facilities.**
  * ##### 2
**Closing a debt facility often takes 6+ months, up to 2 years.**
  * ##### 3
**Traditional funds require labor-intensive manual reports.**


##### The solution
Start
##### No upfront fees, complex agreements, or warrants. Start with an interest-only facility and repay the principal on your schedule.
Grow
##### Achieve up to 10X leverage while building your credit rating and reputation in real-time. No spreadsheets! Share loan data instantly via API or Zapier.
Graduate
##### At $20M in loan portfolio, you're ready to scale with our fund partners while continuing to enjoy Sivo's real-time, industry grade reporting.
##### Debt capital reinvented
**Growth has never been simpler**
We make it easy for companies to get started in minutes with an interest-only debt facility that scales through lender reporting via API or Zapier, all while building your credit rating and industry reputation in real-time. Sivo funds B2C and B2B lending programs, including credit and charge cards, BNPL, earned wage access, merchant cash advances, and more.
[Get started](https://sivo.com/<https:/app.sivo.com/register>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6416463a04ae8a7018b7235e/6418f4e3c46f37949ed12eb8_credit-report.png)
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6416463a04ae8a7018b7235e/6418fd488ea26122fca9296a_Draw-froma-debtline.png)](https://sivo.com/<#>)
### Designed for developers
Ship and fund quickly with API's to move capital, report performance and stay compliant.Explore our no-code options with Zapier where you can connect 5,000+ apps and databasesto Sivo!
[View documentation![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6416463a04ae8a7018b7235e/6416463a04ae8a026db72424_icon-chevron-right-small-white.svg)](https://sivo.com/</developers>)

**About cookies on this site**
❮
❯

Cookies used on the site are categorized and below you can read about each category and allow or deny some or all of them. When categories than have been previously allowed are disabled, all cookies assigned to that category will be removed from your browser. Additionally you can see a list of cookies assigned to each category and detailed information in the cookie declaration.
[Learn more](https://sivo.com/<https:/www.sivo.com/privacy>)
Allow all cookiesDeny all
**Necessary cookies**
Some cookies are required to provide core functionality. The website won't function properly without these cookies and they are enabled by default and cannot be disabled.
[CookieHub](https://sivo.com/<#>)
CookieHub is a Consent Management Platform (CMP) which allows users to control storage and processing of personal information.
  * [Privacy Policy](https://sivo.com/<https:/www.cookiehub.com/legal/privacy-policy>)


  * cookiehub


**Preferences**
Preference cookies enables the web site to remember information to customize how the web site looks or behaves for each user. This may include storing selected currency, region, language or color theme.
[Intercom](https://sivo.com/<#>)
Customer service solution that combines an AI chatbot, help desk, and proactive support.
  * [Privacy Policy](https://sivo.com/<https:/intercom.com/terms-and-policies>)


  * intercom-session-*
  * intercom-device-id-*
  * intercom-id-*


 **Analytical cookies**
Analytical cookies help us improve our website by collecting and reporting information on its usage.
[Google Analytics](https://sivo.com/<#>)
Google Analytics is a web analytics service offered by Google that tracks and reports website traffic.
  * [Privacy Policy](https://sivo.com/<https:/policies.google.com/privacy>)


  * _ga_*
  * _ga
  * _gid
  * _gat_*


[Segment](https://sivo.com/<#>)
  * ajs_anonymous_id


Cookies used on the site are categorized and below you can read about each category and allow or deny some or all of them. When categories than have been previously allowed are disabled, all cookies assigned to that category will be removed from your browser. Additionally you can see a list of cookies assigned to each category and detailed information in the cookie declaration.
[Learn more](https://sivo.com/<https:/www.sivo.com/privacy>)
**Necessary cookies**
Some cookies are required to provide core functionality. The website won't function properly without these cookies and they are enabled by default and cannot be disabled.
Necessary cookiesName| Hostname| Vendor| Expiry  
---|---|---|---  
cookiehub| .sivo.com| [CookieHub](https://sivo.com/<https:/www.cookiehub.com/legal/privacy-policy>)| 365 days  
Used by CookieHub to store information about whether visitors have given or declined the use of cookie categories used on the site.  
**Preferences**
Preference cookies enables the web site to remember information to customize how the web site looks or behaves for each user. This may include storing selected currency, region, language or color theme.
PreferencesName| Hostname| Vendor| Expiry  
---|---|---|---  
intercom-session-| .sivo.com| [Intercom R&D Unlimited Company](https://sivo.com/<https:/intercom.com/terms-and-policies>)| 7 days  
Used by Intercom Messenger to store identifier for each unique browser session and is used to keep track of sessions.  
intercom-device-id-| .sivo.com| [Intercom R&D Unlimited Company](https://sivo.com/<https:/intercom.com/terms-and-policies>)| 270 days, 1 hour  
Used by Intercom Messenger to store identifier for each unique device that interacts with the Messenger. Intercom uses this cookie to determine the unique devices interacting with the Intercom Messenger to prevent abuse.  
intercom-id-| .sivo.com| [Intercom R&D Unlimited Company](https://sivo.com/<https:/intercom.com/terms-and-policies>)| 270 days, 1 hour  
Used by Intercom Messenger to store anonymous visitor identifier cookie.  
**Analytical cookies**
Analytical cookies help us improve our website by collecting and reporting information on its usage.
Analytical cookiesName| Hostname| Vendor| Expiry  
---|---|---|---  
_ga_| .sivo.com| [Google](https://sivo.com/<https:/policies.google.com/privacy>)| 400 days  
Contains a unique identifier used by Google Analytics 4 to determine that two distinct hits belong to the same user across browsing sessions.  
_ga| .sivo.com| [Google](https://sivo.com/<https:/policies.google.com/privacy>)| 400 days  
Contains a unique identifier used by Google Analytics to determine that two distinct hits belong to the same user across browsing sessions.  
_gid| .sivo.com| [Google](https://sivo.com/<https:/policies.google.com/privacy>)| 1 day  
Contains a unique identifier used by Google Analytics to determine that two distinct hits belong to the same user across browsing sessions.  
ajs_anonymous_id| .sivo.com| Twilio Inc.| 365 days  
This cookie is used to aggregate and segment data to different data tracking tools by Segment  
_gat_| .sivo.com| [Google](https://sivo.com/<https:/policies.google.com/privacy>)| 1 hour  
Used by Google Analytics to throttle request rate (limit the collection of data on high traffic sites)  
Save settings

generated_description:
### Sivo: Redefining Debt Capital with a Tech Twist

**Overview:**  
Sivo is a San Francisco-based fintech company that emerged from Y Combinator's W21 batch in 2020. Its mission is to simplify debt access for businesses, providing a seamless “Debt as a Service” solution. Think of Sivo as the Stripe for debt—offering an API and risk protocol that enables fintechs, neobanks, and gig platforms to lend to their users swiftly and efficiently.

**The Problem:**  
Traditionally, raising debt capital is a cumbersome process—often taking six months to two years, replete with complex terms and manual reporting. Many traditional funds shy away from early-stage fintechs, leaving companies in a bind when it comes to accessing necessary funds.

**The Solution:**  
Sivo's approach is transformative. By leveraging technology, they allow businesses to secure up to $20 million in debt capital without the standard hurdles. Their API facilitates an interest-only payment structure that scales as businesses grow, allowing for an accelerated path to credit and reputation building. With integrations through tools like Zapier, sharing loan data becomes a breeze.

**Recent Developments:**  
Launched in March 2023, Sivo quickly established a $100 million debt capital partnership and already boasts a customer pipeline of over 100 companies, including notable names like Uber. Their team of 15 is composed of industry veterans from high-stakes organizations like Goldman Sachs, Revolut, and NASA, giving them a deep well of experience in risk, debt, and enterprise software.

**Leadership:**  
Michael Seibel serves as the Group Partner for Sivo, guiding this dynamic venture with his wealth of knowledge and connections.

**Conclusion:**  
In a world where access to capital is essential yet complex, Sivo stands out as a modern ally for businesses looking to expand their lending capabilities. With its cutting-edge technology and a clear focus on eliminating pain points in the debt acquisition process, Sivo is poised to redefine how companies think about debt financing in this digital age. 

For more information, check out [Sivo's website](https://sivo.com).
